You’re driving down the road listening to your favorite song on the radio.

Who are you going to see?

This is the person that you will discover the body swap ability with.
1.title: Driving down the road

11.content:
As you turn into the driveway and get out of the car your greeted by face, “Took you long enough.” She says smiling, “Ah well with your directions it’s a miracle that I made it here at all.” You say laughing; she then joyfully hugs you, “Thanks again for doing this.” She says, “Anytime Jess.” You say hugging her back. Jess was one of your oldest friends, more like your sister, and to make a little extra money on the weekends she had a little house cleaning business, nothing fancy usually just apartments and single story houses that she would straighten up for the owners. But this time was different, word had gotten around how good she was so she was contacted by a man who wanted her to clean out an old house he had just bought, you know just make it presentable for any potential buyers, and he would pay triple her usual rate. She couldn’t pass that up, but it was bigger than she was use to so she called you for help, you didn’t mind you weren’t doing anything, she said she’d buy you a full tank of gas and lunch so you were happy.

The two of you walk up the front porch steps and through the front door, “Okay now I just need you to take everything not bolted to the ground outside, furniture on the lawn and anything else just put it in the back of your truck. The guy said he already got all the valuable looking stuff but he would still like to sort through anything else we find.” Jess says, “Can do.” You say, “Okay if you need me I’ll be in the back filling boxes.” She says.

The two of you then go your separate ways, from where you had been standing the house looked pretty empty so you decide to go upstairs and work your way down. Upstairs you found boxes, some empty, some full, and various items covered in dust laying around. So you start packing boxes and moving them down stairs. And then when it looked like you notice a rope hanging from the ceiling in the hallway. “Oh you’ve got to be kidding me, there is an attic too?” you say you then move the last of the boxes on that floor downstairs.

As you move the last of the boxes to your truck and Jess’s van she was just coming outside, “Well first floor is done, did you get everything from the second floor?” she asks, “Yeah now it just needs to be swept, hey have you been up to the attic yet?” you ask hoping she had already taken care of it. She looks at you confused, “Attic? That’s funny the owner never mentioned anything about an attic.” She says, “Dang, well one more floor then.” You say walking back to the house, “Okay ill help you with that and then sweep everything down.” She says

The two of you then make your way to the attic, at first you gently tug on the rope, but it wouldn’t budge so you tell Jess to stand back and you pull harder. Suddenly it shoots open in a cloud of dust. “Well I guess no one has been up here in a while.” You say, he two of you then walk carefully up the stairs into an open room with a desk, a chair, candles, and dozens of books. There didn’t seem to be any lights but you could see thanks to a single window. “Well I guess it could be worse. I’ll go get some boxes, open the window and see if you can get us some more light.” Jess says

She then walks down the stairs as you step up into the room and make your way to the window. As you open the window the room is filled with an almost blinding light. Once your eyes adjust you make your way to the table where you find an open book.

You then look down at the open book preparing to decipher the strange words when suddenly Jess walk up the stairs, “Hey what you got there?” she asks, “Nothing just books.” You say closing the book and placing it on the bookshelf. “Okay I’ll box up the light stuff, you find out how to get the desk and chair downstairs.” She says, “Ah fun stuff.” You say sarcastically.

After much time and frustration you manage to get them down them to the front lawn. You then sit down on the tailgate of your truck to catch your breath. Just then, Jess walks up carrying a box with a book on top of it. “Well that’s the last of it,” she says placing the box beside you. “Wait, I think you forgot one.” You say pointing to the book. “No, it just didn’t fit in the box.” She said picking it up and throwing it in your truck. “Okay the moving truck will be by any minute now for the furniture then all we have to do is drop this stuff off and get paid.” She says smiling, “Sweet, cause I’m starving. And you’re buying so I was thinking Olive Garden, maybe that Japanese place I like” You say smiling, “Hey! I said I’d buy you dinner I didn’t say you could pick.” She says smiling, “Oh come on.” You say, “Yep McDonalds dollar menu it is.” She says laughing, “Hey!” you say smiling, “Okay okay I guess you did earn a little more than dollar cheeseburger and small drink.” She says smiling. “Thank you.” You say smiling

Just then the moving truck pulls up and lets down its window, “There you go guys.” She says, “Alright lets head out.” She says, you then get in your vehicles and you follow her. About twenty minutes later you arrive at a house even bigger than the old one, as you pull up Jess is talking to a man while two other men unload her van, you then get out and begin unloading your truck, once the van was emptied the two men joined you and in no time both vehicles were unloaded.

The man hands Jess an envelope, thanks both of you, and walks inside. The two of you then get in your vehicles and drive away. She then buys you a full tank of gas and takeout from a reasonably priced restaurant and the two of you head back to her place to eat. When you get there you carry the food inside and the two of you eat while watching TV.

(Alright everyone, this is the part where you decide what kind of Lost Body swapping secret they discover)
11.title: A Female Friend

111.content:
After you’re done eating you see your phone is about to die, “Hang on I’m going to go get my phone charger.” You say, as you search your truck you find the book that didn’t fit in the box. So you pick it up and bring it inside. “Hey you forgot this.” You say putting the book on the coffee table. “Oh yeah, well ill just return it tomorrow.” She says, as you walk over to plug up your phone picks up the book and looks at it, “You know it’s weird, there isn’t any writing on the outside of the book, not even a symbol. How are you suppose to know what it is?” she ask, “Maybe it’s handmade and the owner never planned on selling it.” You say.

She then opens the book to a random page, “Hey check this out.” She says as she hands you the book, “Wow I’ve never seen symbols like these before, but for some reason… I think know what it means.” You say pointing it out to her, “What do you mean?” she says, “I didn’t say I could read it, it’s just like my brain naturally understands it.” You say, “Here try again, but don’t try to read it just look at it.” You say handing her the book. She stares at the page, at first it is sarcastically as though she was just humoring you, but then she her expression turned serious.

“Wait, you’re right.” She says as she turns the page, “But how is that possible?” you ask, “Well the best place to start is the beginning; let’s see what the first page says.” She says,

She then lays the book onto the coffee table and flips to the first page. The two of you then begin reading, or at least understanding what it the symbols mean.

Moments later the two of you silently sit back on the couch, “This can’t be real, it has to be some kind of trick” you say, “Well we just ‘read’ a book in a language we have never seen and since we found this in an old abandoned house I doubt this is the latest technology.” She says, “So let’s see if I’m getting this right. It’s says that this isn’t magic, and the reason we can naturally understand it is because it is written in the ‘original’ language.” You say

“Yeah that’s what I got too and that this thing contains knowledge that has been past down since the beginning to preserve that which has been lost to time and legend.” She says

“Yeah are we sure this isn’t fiction because this would make a great movie.” You say

“Yeah.” She says, “So let’s see what kind of ancient wisdom this thing possesses?” you say picking up the book and flipping the page. “Okay let’s see, the truth of trading bodies?” you say

“Yeah, it says the soul is what is important and the body is just a vessel, and even though a body’s original soul has presidency over it, under the right circumstances two people can trade bodies.” she says, “What kind of circumstances?” you asks, “Well let’s see it says, that two souls form a network and agree on a trigger word and that’s pretty much it?” she say laughing

“Wow, I mean think about it, all the movies were wrong? They could come up with magic and technology but they never considered two people could just trade as easily as exchanging cars?” you say laughing,
Jess then turns to you with a big smile on her face, “let’s try it!” she exclaimed, “Wait what?” you say, “Let’s try to switch bodies.” She says, “You can’t be serious.” You say, “Yea I am come on.” She says excitedly, “Come on it’ll be fun, now first it ways that knowledge is power, so reading this gives a person the power, next two people have to agree on a trigger word.” She says, “Okay,” you say humoring her, “what about, Tag you’re it?” you say laughing, “Hmm a little long, but I like it.” She says smiling, “Okay so we read the book, we agreed on a word now it looks like one of us just has to say it.” She says, “Okay, Tag you’re it.” You say.

Suddenly what you’re looking at changes, it was like switching from one channel to the next. One moment you were looking down at Jess reading the book and the next thing you knew you were looking at the book! Confused you look up to see yourself, standing there speechless. You knew exactly what had just happened but you didn’t want to believe it, so you rushed to the closest mirror!

What body do you see?

(Okay now up until this point I haven’t given a physical description of either of them. So now you can decide what you and Jess look like. Please use pictures if possible.)

1111.content:
You make it to the hallway mirror to find yourself staring at an oh too familiar face, but it wasn’t your own, it was Jess!

You still couldn’t believe it, you looked yourself up and down only to see her very feminine body. And unfortunately for you when she got home she change out of her comfortable work clothes and into something sexy, you were actually a little surprised when she came out of her room dressed red spaghetti strap shirt and a pair of shorts, I mean her closet was full of stuff like this, maybe her feminine ego wanted to feels sexy after a day of cleaning but that meant now you were. Her breasts were heavy, her legs were long, and her butt was firm. Everything you had always knew she had was now staring you right in the face.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ITknNsBVmrc/Te...

“Oh No! NO! NO! NO, this can’t be happening!” you exclaim, shaking in horror. You then with a traumatized stager you make your way back to the living room, it felt so weird, your body felt so light but your proportions felt off, like you were top heavy. You slowly sit down taking deep breaths, but your concentrations is soon broken by the sound of your own laughter, well at least your bodies laughter. You look up to see Jess flexing your muscles and smiling, “This is amazing; I’ve never felt anything like this.” She says lifting a chair over her head with one hand. You then jump out of your seat, “Put that down! This isn’t awesome, and this isn’t funny! We’ve got to switch back, NOW!” you exclaim in your new feminine voice. “What are you talking about? It worked!” she says, “TAG YOUR IT!” you exclaim, closing your eyes and then slowly opening them as though this was all a bad dream that would just go away.

But unfortunately you were still looking at your own smiling face, without a mirror. You then rush over to the book and flip through the pages, “No! it said that we should both be able to call for the switch.” You say, “True, but it also said that you have to wait an hour.” She says smiling, “AHH!!!!!!” you scream, “Chill JESS.” She says smiling, “Ha ha very funny.” You say giving her an irritated look, “Oh don’t get you panties in a wad…” she says then once she realizes that in this current situation that statement actually applies she bursts out laughing, which causes you to turn red and made you realize it. “Hey!” you exclaim, “I’m so sorry,” she says still laughing, “It was an accident I swear.”

You then naturally cross your arms and start pouting, and once you realized you were, “Ah!” you exclaim uncrossing them quickly, “Wow no way, you did “the look” without even trying. I guess it’s a reflex.” She says laughing. “Ah.” You exclaim breathing deeply until you fall back onto the couch. “Don’t worry we only got another fifty minutes to go.” She says smiling

After an agonizing hour of you trying to remain still and covered up on the coach watching TV as to not draw attentions to any aspect of your body while at the same time watching Jess enjoy your body, she could jump and touch the ceiling since your body was taller than she was use to and your upper body strength which she had used to lift everything that wasn’t nailed down.

Finally, it was just about time, “Man it’s nice not having to sit down every time.” Jess says walking back into the living room while zipping up her pants, “But this things got a mind of its own.” She says laughing, realizing what she had just done with your body, you stair intently at the clock while repeating, “Tag you it,” over and over until suddenly you’re not looking at the clock anymore. “Oh thank god!” you exclaim jumping up and down in your own body, you then look over to see Jess getting up off the couch.

“See now that wasn’t so bad now was it?” she asks, “Speak for yourself, I was counting the seconds.” You say laughing, “Oh was being me such a bad thing?” she asks, “Well yeah.” You say, “Wait what do you mean,” she asks seriously, “Ah well it’s just that your body...” you say, “And what’s wrong with my body!” she exclaims, “Nothing, it’s just I don’t like it.” You says, “What!” she yells, “No it’s not that I don’t like it, it’s that I don’t like being in it, so we shouldn’t do it again.” You say, “Oh come on, we’ve found something amazing, it would be wrong to waste it.” She says enthusiastically, but you simply take a deep breath, “Sorry Jess, but hey it’s getting late, I’m going to head home.” You say, “Oh yeah okay.” She says dishearten, she then gives you a hug and you leave.

You then drive back to your place, take a shower, and go to sleep. You were sorry that you hurt her feelings but it was just so weird being a girl, you were fully dressed and safe indoors. You couldn’t imagine going out in public as her. You then drift off to sleep.

The next morning,

The next morning you wake up thinking the night before was nothing more than a crazy dream. That it was understandable after spending the day with Jess and then coming back to chill at her place. As you look around the room you notice you were still there, but you could have sworn you had gone back home last night but figured it was just part of the dream.

You then search the house for Jess but she is nowhere to be found, until you begin to make your way down the hallway. Still half asleep you see her walking towards you, as you pause to stretch, and so does she, at the moment you also noticed your body felt different. First you take a closer look at Jess, quickly realizing you were actually looking into the hallway mirror, suddenly a chill runs down your spin as you look down to see Jess’s body in her pajamas.

You then rush to the mirror to confirm your fears; you quickly realize it wasn’t a dream. You the desperately try to think back to how it worked, “Okay let’s see, it was a word, yeah that’s right Tag.” You say closing your eyes as though you would be waking up from a dream. Unfortunately you find yourself still staring down at Jess’s cleavage. “Oh come on!” you exclaim, “I know it had something to do with that stupid kid’s game.” You think to yourself, “Oh that’s right, Tag you’re it!” you exclaim closing your eyes.

(Okay now do you switch back or has it not been an hour yet?)

11113.content:
The sound of a heavy-metal band in your room rattles your brain from a dream of cleaning houses as Jess waiting to change back into your own body. You wildly swing at the sound coming from your nightstand and silence it. The phone's screen glows slowly into focus as you pull it over and squint at it with barely enough consciousness to recognize the number.

"Je-Jess," you sputter through your dry mouth and throat. "It's the middle of the night."

"It's way past sunrise, sleepy head, and I've got exciting news for you. I've arranged for that one-on-one with Melissa you've wanted so you can find out more about her and see if you're compatible."

Melissa O'Mara is a redhead from across town that was in one of the pictures Jess took on a school exchange day she had gone on to your rival school. Your mind snaps to attention at the words remembering the picture.

http://tiskin.com/wp-content/uploads/201...

You've been bugging Jess to tell you about her, but Jess would just shrug it off saying she doesn't really know anything about her. Still you would dream about going on a date with her and occasionally ask Jess to contact her to set something up.

Suddenly your mouth becomes moist, and you quickly ask, "Yeah. When?"

"The only time she can meet is this morning, but I know you're not a morning person, and it would take you forever to get across town. So, Tag, you're it."

Instantly the cozy dimness of your room is replaced by bright light, although it is filtered through something in front of your eyes. You recognize that they are sunglasses and that you are now sitting at a small outside table with a cup of coffee and looking down the sidewalk watching Melissa walk towards you with a smile on her face.

"Have fun. See you in an hour, Jess. Make sure you put in good words about me," you hear your own voice from the phone you're holding just before the line disconnects.

It's then you realize that Jess has set you up as her to meet with Melissa, and there's no time to hide. You start to panic and almost scream into the phone even though no one is there. Melissa is almost here. The only thing you can do is go through with it pretending to be Jess and finding out all you can as well as set yourself up with her before Jess brings your body in an hour.

113.title: Other

info.brief_description: An ancient text pits two friends against each other in a body swap war.
info.description:
Alright all my beloved readers and writers, as you have all noticed I have been revising all of my stories. Now even though this is one of my more recent items, I’ve saved it for last so that I could rename it and expand on the basic premise.

Originally this story was about the “Tag you’re it” style body swap. But I have decided to make things more interesting by coming up with and allowing my writers to come up with some original body swap methods. And keep in mind that I am not saying that these are all original ideas for transformations but I know that I haven’t found them on this site yet. Unlike the standard; remote swap, body swap machine, website, witch, amulet, random, or one of my favorites someone somehow has control over another person.

For example:
1. The idea of “Switch” or “Tag you’re it” is that two people create an agreement that allows them to trade bodies simply by saying the trigger word.
2. And the other idea which inspired me to expand this story is “Body Bet” which is similar to “Tag your it” except two people make a bet and wager their bodies for a period of time on the outcome.
3. And if you can think of any new ideas that you would like to see feel free to post and ill work with you to make it happen.

But regardless of how the swap works the idea is that you stumble onto some sort of text that reveals to you the lost art of trading bodies. And another original idea I want to introduce is that what you find isn’t a spell book, in fact it specifically states that magic is not involved, and that body trading is a natural thing that human beings have always been able to do. The truth was simply forgotten with time as it faded into obscurity.

So depending on the circumstances, once you and another person discover how to trade bodies it soon becomes a competition to see you can swap the other into the worse situation or winning the bet and swap with the other person so that they have to do something the other doesn’t want to such as a doctor’s appointment, work, school, jail, being sick/hung-over, at a restaurant holding a bill with no money, at the beach in a string bikini, ext.

Now pretty much anything goes but try and keep it relevant to the idea, and please:
1. When adding content make it meaningful and try to make it at least a solid paragraph, if it’s just pointless fillers it’s gone.
2. No mental changes, if he’s not mentally there to react to the situation what’s the point?
3. No gay stuff, even if a guy is technically a girl, he’s still a guy, so no willing attraction to guys
4. And with the new male attention that comes with female body, no friends falling in love with him, and no rape, they can hit on him, flirt, and sexually harass him but if it crosses the line it’s gone

Please keep in mind that none of my stories are meant to be about sex or playing with the new body so keep it to a minimum, and you aren’t supposed to be enjoying this

And I want to see my stories grow but if I’m the only one writing it’s no fun. So if you have any comments or suggestions please feel free to send me a message, I would be more than happy to take requests. So please add, and help me make this story a success.
info.pretty_title: The Lost Art of Trading Bodies
